statements: UPDATE customers SET address='123 Main St' WHERE customer_id=1;

UPDATE orders SET total_amount=150.75, order_date='2022-09-15 08:30:00' WHERE order_id=5;
UPDATE users SET email='new.email@example.com', username='new_username' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE orders SET total_amount=150.50, order_date=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE order_id=100;

UPDATE order_history SET total_amount = 150.25, order_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE order_id = 5;

UPDATE account SET balance=5000.00, account_type='Gold' WHERE customer_id=(SELECT customer_id FROM customer WHERE first_name='Alice');
